laazotea.indi.driver

Class INDIPortProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • laazotea.indi.driver.INDIProperty
      • laazotea.indi.driver.INDITextProperty
        • laazotea.indi.driver.INDIPortProperty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class INDIPortProperty
extends INDITextProperty
    A class representing a the standard INDI PORT Property.
    Version:
    1.34, November 7, 2013
    Author:
    S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjioi at ugr.es]
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • INDIPortProperty

        public INDIPortProperty(INDIDriver driver,
                java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Constructs an instance of a PORTS property, with its PORT element. If the default value is null, "/dev/ttyUSB0" is assumed.
        Parameters:
        driver - The Driver to which this property is associated
        defaultValue - The default value for the port

    • Method Detail

      • createSaveablePortProperty

        public static INDIPortProperty createSaveablePortProperty(INDIDriver driver,
                                          java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Loads an instance of INDIPortProperty from a file or, if it cannot be loaded, constructs it with a particular driver and default value. The property will autosave its status to a file every time that it is changed.
        Parameters:
        driver - The Driver to which this property is associated.
        defaultValue - The default value for the port
        Returns:
        The loaded port property or a new constructed one if cannot be loaded.

      • getPort

        public java.lang.String getPort()
        Gets the PORT element value.
        Returns:
        The PORT element value

      • setPort

        public void setPort(java.lang.String port)
        Sets the PORT element value.
        Parameters:
        port - The new value for the PORT element

      • processTextValue

        public void processTextValue(INDITextProperty property,
                    INDITextElementAndValue[] elementsAndValues)
        Sets the PORT element value if the property corresponds to this object. This method is a convenience one that can be placed in INDIDriver.processNewTextValue safely.
        Parameters:
        property - If this property corresponds to this PORTS property, the property will be updated
        elementsAndValues - An array of pairs of Text Elements and its requested values to be parsed and updated if property corresponds to this PORTS property
        See Also:
        INDIDriver.processNewTextValue(laazotea.indi.driver.INDITextProperty, java.util.Date, laazotea.indi.driver.INDITextElementAndValue[])
